course_title: Anesthesia for Surgical Procedures and Special Populations II
course_description: This course focuses on the evaluation and management of patients with increased complexity. Current evidence will be used to formulate an anesthetic plan and administration of anesthesia for increasingly complex surgical procedures and/or comorbidities for patients of diverse populations.
prerequisites: NRSG 563 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 3443, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 8a-5p, Instructor: Moore/Wiltse Nicely, Status: Closed
